title: Bug 17289 - Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: Try clicking on the first Combo.
OB: When clicking on the first Combo, the focus caret does not appear in the first Combo 'Host:'.
EB: The focus caret should appear in the first Combo 'Host:' when it is clicked.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the application.
2. Click on the first Combo 'Host:'.
